home.title: CRM HUB Manager
home.subtitle: Customer Relationship Management Dashboard for {{org}}
home.no_permission: You don’t have permission to view this page.
home.welcome_message: Manage your customer relationships, orders, products, and track customer satisfaction all in one place.
home.tqm360_description: CRM HUB Manager is a comprehensive Customer Relationship Management system that helps you manage orders, customers, products, and track customer satisfaction through ratings and NPS scores.
home.announcements_coming_soon: Stay tuned—reports and automations are being rolled out incrementally.
home.features_description: CRM HUB Manager provides comprehensive tools to manage your customer relationships and business operations.
home.feature_orders_desc: Create and manage customer orders, track order status, and assign orders to service locations.
home.feature_customers_desc: Search and manage customer information, track customer history, and maintain customer notes.
home.feature_products_desc: Manage your product catalog with categories, brands, tags, and inventory tracking.
home.feature_ratings_desc: Collect customer feedback, track satisfaction scores, and measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).
home.nps_intro: Net Promoter Score measures how likely customers are to recommend your service to others.
home.nps_step1: Ask: “How likely are you to recommend our service based on this experience?” (0–10).
home.nps_note_proxy: Using your current 3-point scale: happy → Promoter, medium → Passive, sad → Detractor, so NPS_proxy = %happy − %sad.
home.examples_footer: Use weighted org rollup (sum counts then compute). Always show sample sizes; flag small samples.
home.collect_qr: QR posters at exit (scan to rate in 5 seconds).
home.collect_whatsapp: WhatsApp link in receipts or post-visit follow-up.
home.collect_after_ticket: Transactional survey after support ticket closure.
home.guard_sample: Low sample sizes (<20) are flagged as low confidence.
home.guard_trend: Track 7/28-day trend and split by branch/agent/channel.
